effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect_entries.short_effect: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
